about.title: About

about.description1: I am highly driven and passionate frontend JavaScript ES6+ engineer
about.description1Detail: that loves learning and finding new ways to gain and share expertise, knowledge and ideas. Specialized in Angular, React and Next.js ecosystems.
about.description2: I am writing clean and maintainable code, and providing great user experience.
about.description3Detail: if complexity balloons, I delete it and design the simpler path.

contact.title: Building Something Amazing?
contact.subtitle: Let's chat.
contact.description: I build fast, accessible web apps with React, Angular, Node.js, and TypeScript. I'm looking for teams that value product quality, performance, and thoughtful UX.
